channel.title: Pass on Taryn Pratt

item.title: Finally, My first PASS Summit
item.description: I’ve been working with SQL Server for a long time, and have always wanted to attend PASS. For one reason of another, with numerous employers, I hadnâ€™t been able to go. The answer was always no. <insert sad face> The biggest blocker was always the cost. The conference is expensive. Seattle is expensive. It has always been impossible to get my employer to foot the bill for it. This year I was incredibly lucky that my employer, Stack Overflow, paid for my trip to PASS Summit.
